readable.title: 2786245676_0a69543832
readable.content: A little boy wearing a red wristband grins as he holds something . A small boy wearing a light blue shirt smiles as he holds something in his hand . A young boy smiling with something in his hand a young man wearing a blue striped shirt standing in front of a floral patterened couch Near a window and a chair , a young boy in a blue shirt holds something in his hand and smiles .
